content: the laid back lace wrap is the simplest way to showcase the beautiful colorways of lion brand mandala yarn sometimes the simplest projects are the best get into the groove and let your hook fly as the colors flow by requires only one cake of yarn with no cutting of color changes go with the flow youtube tutorial https //youtu be/6lo9kf5owau this simple light rectangular wrap can be worn as a shawl or knotted like a scarf perfect as a first crochet wrap for a beginner for a fast project for a gift or as a project you can work on while you watch tv without having to think too much a fast crocheter could complete this wrap from start to finish in less than 3 hours a more leisurely or beginner stitcher will require 6-7 hours this is a beginner pattern and requires only chain and single_crochet stitches pattern is written in us terms and includes explanations of all stitches and abbreviations us and metric measurements given finished dimensions are about 66 by 20 inches 168 by 51 cm when using 1 cake of lion brand mandala dk weight yarn and an 11 5 mm hook pattern pdf includes color photos and detailed instructions for blocking techniques for beginners please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern if you give pattern design credit as laid back lace wrap pattern by susan kennedy of prettypeaceful
